definition: sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Cover and boil 3 to 5 minutes longer or until crisp-tender.
sentences.chinese: 再盖锅煮3到5分钟或更长直到变得清脆细嫩。

sentences.english: When the meadows laugh with lively green.
sentences.chinese: 青草地一片青翠，笑得真清脆。

sentences.english: Because a clear and crisp bell rings, we descend to greatly watch with interest a car.
sentences.chinese: 随着一声清脆的铃响，我们下了大观览车。

sentences.english: Balanced by crisp acidity for a long and memorable finish.
sentences.chinese: 酸度清脆平衡，余味悠长，回味无穷。

sentences.english: When hit with a spoon, the brass candlestick will ring.
sentences.chinese: 拿勺子敲敲那铜烛台，能敲出清脆的响声。

sentences.english: The boy has a clear voice – when he sings it's beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 这男孩子嗓音清脆，唱起歌来悦耳动听。

sentences.english: It was filled with the calls of wild birds and the crystal sound of running water in the ravine.
sentences.chinese: 在深谷里到处是野禽鸣叫声和清脆的潺潺流水声。

sentences.english: As a clear voice and ushered in the second quarter of class meetings.
sentences.chinese: 随着一阵清脆的声音，迎来了第二节班会课。

sentences.english: A clear sound, spreads to my ear bank.
sentences.chinese: 一阵清脆的响声，传入我的耳畔。

sentences.english: He heard the sharp crack of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 他听到树清脆的断裂声。

sentences.english: A trumpet call, clear and beautiful, floated into the stagnant air.
sentences.chinese: 沉浊的空气中响了一声清脆动听的喇叭。

sentences.english: When the meadows laugh with lives green.
sentences.chinese: 青草地一片青翠，笑得真清脆。

sentences.english: The sound of the cackling kookaburra rang out across the earth.
sentences.chinese: 笑翠鸟清脆的叫声响彻地球。

sentences.english: The sound of a bird vanished into thin air.
sentences.chinese: 那清脆的鸟叫声消失得无影无踪。

sentences.english: Sound clear enough so that all eyes were stopped breathing.
sentences.chinese: 足音清脆，让所有的目光都停止呼吸。
大炮发出短促清脆的轰响。

definition: sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 清脆
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
